text: E'i katha suni chula'imane micikiya hamhile arau ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Tumi moka samartha diya yate ma'i tomara krtajnata jnapana karaiba parao, mora prati arau mora pitr-matrra prati tumi yi anugraha karaicha tara babe arau yate ma'i enekuraa satkarma karaiba parao yito tumi pachanda karaa. Lagate tomara anugraherae moka tomara satkarmaparaayana bandasakalara antarbhukta karaa’
